item.title: 10.1 Function
item.description: General function # ‚ùó General functions for the entire site. 1. Export data # Click on Download to export data: XLSX: Download the Excel form of the current page. PDF: Download the PDF of the current page. Download all XLSX: Download all pages in Excel format. Download all PDF: Download all PDF all pages. 2. Other functions # Click on to refresh the list.
